statements: DELETE FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics WHERE athlete_id = 101 AND workout_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM AthletePerformanceMetrics WHERE reps_completed > 15 AND weight_lifted <= 100.5;
DELETE FROM athlete_metrics WHERE athlete_id = 100 AND reps_completed > 10;
DELETE FROM workout_programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM WorkoutHistory WHERE workout_id = 100 AND time_taken > '01:00:00';
DELETE FROM AthleteMetrics WHERE reps_completed < 10 AND weight_lifted >= 100;
DELETE FROM athletes WHERE age > 30 AND weight < 70.5;
DELETE FROM Athletes WHERE athlete_age > 30 AND athlete_gender = 'Male';
